ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant priorities again
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is it still OK to litter the landscape with stacks of several hundred copper? asked the poor, encumbered bard scouring the zone for free money ;^) ...
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sylly shouts to the zone, "Did you see the login message???
> Littering zones
> with foraged items is now a BANNABLE offense!!!"

"Is it still OK to litter the landscape with stacks of several hundred
copper?" asked the poor, encumbered bard scouring the zone for free money
;^)

> Sylly tells the guild, "Did you see Gordon's latest post??? They have
> discovered that some players are killing NPC's purely for exp
> and getting
> levels. After the next patch, you will no longer get *any*
> exp from killing
> NPC's. All exp will be earned through quests only.

Nah, then they'd have to fix the broken quests.

> p.s. level 51 is bad, real bad, really really bad. But now I
> am done and 52
> seems a bit better.

Congrats, Sylly

Peace
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
